biotools.summary: Statistical analysis for haplotype, parametric linkage, non-parametric linkage (NPL), identity by descent (IBD) and mistyping analyses on any size of pedigree. Uses Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) and simulated annealing algorithms.

bioschemas.name: SimWalk
bioschemas.summary: Statistical analysis for haplotype, parametric linkage, non-parametric linkage (NPL), identity by descent (IBD) and mistyping analyses on any size of pedigree. Uses Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) and simulated annealing algorithms.
